programlisting: <lexicographicResource uri="http://example.com" langCode="en"> <entry id="colour"> <headword>colour</headword> <partOfSpeech tag="n"/> <label tag="europeanSpelling"/> <sense id="colour-1"> <definition> <text>red, blue, yellow etc.</text> </definition> <example> <text>What is your favourite colour?</text> </example> </sense> </entry> <entry id="color"> <headword>color</headword> <partOfSpeech tag="n"/> <label tag="americanSpelling"/> </entry> <relation type="variants"> <member ref="colour"/> <member ref="color"/> </relation> <relationType type="variants"> <description>words which differ only in spelling</description> <memberType type="entry" min="2" hint="navigate"/> </relationType> </lexicographicResource>
